titles.title: Calling upon Yasser Arafat and the leaders of other countries in the Middle East to accept the existence of Israel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 3/20/2002--Introduced. Calls upon: (1) Yasser Arafat to formally renounce any map of Palestine that denies the existence of the State of Israel; and (2) the leaders of Saudi Arabia, Egypt, Jordan, Syria, Libya, Iran, Iraq, and other nations that have historically been enemies of Israel to express their commitment to peaceful coexistence with Israel through a similar public expression of accepting Israel's existence.
